upcomingProjects.title: Mobile Hospitals: Revolutionizing Rural & Tribal Healthcare
upcomingProjects.description: Sewa Bharti's Mobile Medical Unit (MMU) project aims to transform healthcare access in rural and tribal areas of Madhya Pradesh, particularly in the Indore Division covering Mhow, Udainagar, Rajpur, Sendhwa, and Barwani. These 'Hospitals on Wheels' are equipped with modern medical tools, expert staff, and diagnostic facilities, delivering comprehensive care directly to underserved communities.
upcomingProjects.impact: Bridging healthcare gaps in underserved areas
keyFeatures: Modern medical tools and diagnostic facilities

highlights.title: Mobile Healthcare Initiative Launch
highlights.excerpt: Revolutionary mobile medical units set to transform healthcare delivery in Madhya Pradesh's tribal and rural regions.

highlights.title: Partnership with National Health Mission
highlights.excerpt: Strategic collaboration announced to align mobile hospital services with national healthcare objectives.

highlights.title: Advanced Medical Equipment Procurement
highlights.excerpt: State-of-the-art diagnostic tools and medical equipment acquired for comprehensive healthcare delivery.
